\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{database.auto.indexonfk}
\label{configuration:DatabaseAutoIndexonfk}
\ClearAPI
Defines whether ambeth should create indexes for foreign key columns automatically if they do not exist yet. Valid values are "true" and "false".
